title: FREE KDP Keyword Research Tool 2024 - Find 1000's of Profitable Keywords COMPLETELY FREE!

tactics.name: asin_reverse_search
tactics.description: Use Amazon's ASIN reverse search tool to extract keywords from top-selling books in a niche
steps: Identify a niche and select best-selling books
Input ASINs into the reverse search tool
Filter keywords by search volume and weight metrics
source_quotes: Essentially what you want to do is find a niche... put them into this ASIN reverse search tool

heuristics.name: high_value_keyword_filter
heuristics.condition: If keyword has high search volume and weight, prioritize it
source_quotes: The best keywords would have really high searches and also a really good weight

claims.statement: ASIN Seed is a free Amazon reverse search tool for keyword research
source_quotes: The free tool I'm talking about in this video is actually a website called ASIN Seed

niche_patterns.example: curious minds + information gap + niche audience
niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience needs within a niche
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (target audience), problem (search intent), and constraint (niche relevance)
source_quotes: You just want to manually filter out any ones that aren't relevant to your book
